**January 2025 Work Progress Report: Changes to BTC Payouts for Bitcoin Gold Mining**

https://2miners.com/blog/january-2025-work-progress-report-changes-to-btc-payouts-for-bitcoin-gold-mining/

January 2025 brought key updates for the 2Miners mining pool, including critical node upgrades, block reward reductions, and changes to Bitcoin payouts for Bitcoin Gold (BTG) mining. Let's take a closer look at all the changes.

**BTC Payouts Disabled for BTG Mining**

We provided the option to receive BTC payouts for mining Bitcoin Gold (BTG), facilitated through the Gate.io exchange.

As [Gate.io is closing BTG deposits](https://www.gate.io/announcements/article/43080) in the coming days, BTC payouts for BTG mining will no longer be available.

From now on, all BTG mining payouts will be made exclusively in BTG.

Pending BTC payouts from the past few days will be processed if the exchange completes the necessary deposit transactions.

**Karlsen (KLS) reward reduction has happened.**

In accordance with the [Karlsencoin Tokenomics](https://www.karlsencoin.com/tokenomics.html) and [KARLSEN EMISSION SCHEDULE](https://karlsencoin.com/docs/karlsen-whitepaper-v1.0.1.pdf), there was a reward reduction in the Karlsen block.

The block reward for miners was reduced from 35.15 KLS to 34.19 KLS.

Please pay attention!

[2CryptoCalc](https://2cryptocalc.com/kls-mining-calculator) was updated.

[Karlsen Pool](https://kls.2miners.com/) | [Karlsen SOLO Pool](https://solo-kls.2miners.com/)
